header.headline: OUR STORY
header.description: Nova Remedy was founded with a belief that improved diet, exercise, and behavioral choices that combine Eastern & Western medicine philosophies can truly change a person's life.

props.title: Increase your energy levels
props.description: With our video tutorials, boost your energy levels naturally and feel re-energized and rejuvenated.

props.title: Decrease your blood pressure
props.description: Lifestyle changes can significantly reduce high blood pressure and even lower your risk for hypertension.

props.title: Build a custom nutrition plan
props.description: We can help you create meal plans that are nutritious, easy-to-follow, and most importantly, taste great.

props.title: Save money on medications
props.description: Through a more natural approach highlighting diet and exercise, you can lessen your need for costly medications.

props.title: Interactive
props.description: Coaching from doctors and lives chats with medical professionals.
